headline: NFWF Announces $3 Million in Grants through the Southeast Aquatics Fund
summary: Eight projects will benefit freshwater species by improving water qualityWASHINGTON, D.C., Feb. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The National Fish and Wildlife Foundation (NFWF) today announced $3 million in grants to restore aquatic habitats to benefit native freshwater species in Alabama, Florida, Georgia, Mississippi and Tennessee. The grants will leverage $1.9 million in matching contributions for a total conservation impact of $4.9 million. The grants were competitively awarded through the Sout
